name: ofetch_retry_status_codes
description: Exact HTTP codes for retry in ofetch
prompt: What are the exact HTTP status codes that ofetch will retry on by default? List all of them.

groundTruth.validationQuery: ofetch retries on exactly these 8 status codes: 408, 409, 425, 429, 500, 502, 503, 504. The answer must include ALL of these codes.

name: ofetch_null_body_codes
description: Exact null body response codes in ofetch
prompt: What exact HTTP status codes are in ofetch's nullBodyResponses set?

groundTruth.validationQuery: ofetch's nullBodyResponses contains exactly: 101, 204, 205, 304. Must have all 4.

name: ofetch_payload_methods
prompt: What HTTP methods are in ofetch's payloadMethods set? List all of them exactly.

groundTruth.validationQuery: ofetch's payloadMethods are exactly: PATCH, POST, PUT, DELETE. Must be uppercase and include all 4.

name: ofetch_text_content_types
description: Exact text content types in ofetch
prompt: In ofetch's detectResponseType, what content types are treated as 'text'? List the exact strings checked.

groundTruth.validationQuery: ofetch treats these as text: starts with 'text/', or includes 'image/svg', 'application/xml', 'application/xhtml', 'application/html'. Must mention these exact strings.

name: tanstack_query_eslint_url
description: Exact ESLint docs URL pattern in TanStack Query
prompt: What is the exact URL pattern returned by TanStack Query's getDocsUrl() function for ESLint rules?

groundTruth.validationQuery: The exact URL pattern is: https://tanstack.com/query/latest/docs/eslint/${ruleName}. Must contain this exact base URL.

name: tanstack_streamed_hydration
description: Exact component name for streaming hydration
prompt: What is the exact export name for TanStack Query's streaming hydration component in @tanstack/react-query-next-experimental?

groundTruth.validationQuery: The exact export name is ReactQueryStreamedHydration. Must be this exact string.

name: hono_not_found_text
prompt: What is the exact response body text returned by Hono's default notFound handler?

groundTruth.validationQuery: Hono's default notFound returns exactly '404 Not Found' as the body text.

name: zod_email_regex_pattern
prompt: What is the exact regex pattern string used by Zod for z.string().email() validation?

groundTruth.validationQuery: Zod's email regex is: /^(?!\.)(?!.*\.\.)([A-Z0-9_+-.]*)[A-Z0-9_+-]@([A-Z0-9][A-Z0-9-]*\.)+[A-Z]{2,}$/i. Must contain this pattern or describe it accurately.

name: drizzle_is_placeholder
prompt: What is the exact property name Drizzle ORM uses to identify SQL placeholders (the symbol key)?

groundTruth.validationQuery: Drizzle uses Symbol.for('drizzle:IsDrizzleReader') or similar pattern with 'IsDrizzleReader' to identify placeholders.

name: effect_fiber_status
description: Exact fiber status values in Effect-TS
prompt: What are the exact string values for FiberStatus in Effect-TS (the _tag values)?

groundTruth.validationQuery: Effect-TS FiberStatus has exactly 3 states: 'Done', 'Running', 'Suspended'. Must list all 3.
